entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 19 January 2023
